Quiz App
Simple Tech Quiz //Question A a. Which one of the following is a search engine? Amazon Google Chrome //Question B b. Who owns WhatsApp?? YouTube Facebook Bill Gates //Question C c. Most used Mobile OS? iOS Android Linux //Question D d. Which one of the following statements is true about Java? Java has a huge developer community Java is used only in web applications Java is used only in NASA\'s space applications //Question E e. In Java, a class define… (hint: choose two)? Behavior Values Attributes //Question F f. What is name of the latest Android OS? 2017 version //Submit BTN Submit
